BOOLEAN RamHandler::Append (  RamHandle  hp,
const void HUGE *  buffer,
UINT32  count
)  [static]
 

Adds the specified data in the end of the existing file.

Parameters:
hp The file handle.
buffer Pointer to the local store where to copy data from.
count Number of bytes to copy.
Returns:
if the operation is successful.

Changes the current working directory.

Parameters:

Returns:

RamHandle RamHandler::Create (  const WString &  file_name,
UINT32  size
)  [static]
 

Creates an empty file and returns the file-handle.

Parameters:
file_name The name of the file to create.
size The initial size of the file.
Returns:
Pointer to the handle of the file.

void RamHandler::Deinitialize (   )  [static]
 

Destroys the root file system, the current working directory and the capacity of the RAM drive. Must be called before any other method of this class.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::Delete (  const WString &  file_name  )  [static]
 

Deletes the file. The file should not be open when the delete operation is requested.

Parameters:
file_name The name of the file to be deleted.
Returns:
if the operation is successful

BOOLEAN RamHandler::FileExists (  const WString &  file_name  )  [static]
 

Checks the RAM drive for the presence of the file with the specified name.

Parameters:
file_name The name of the file.
Returns:
TRUE: File already exists. FALSE: File does not exist.

RamHandle RamHandler::Find (  const WString &  file_name  )  [static]
 

Finds a file with the specified name and returns the file-handle.

Parameters:
file_name The name of the file to find.
Returns:
Pointer to the handle of the file, null if file does not exist.

void RamHandler::FindDone (   )  [static]
 

Must be called if the last file is reached according to the file spec

BOOLEAN RamHandler::FindFirst (  RamHandle *  found_file,
const WString &  filespec
)  [static]
 

Returns the first stored file that matches the filespec.

Parameters:
found_file Pointer to the file info record where to store data.
filespec Target file specification (may include the wildcards '?' and '*').
Returns:
TRUE: A file is found FALSE: No file found.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::FindNext (  RamHandle *  found_file  )  [static]
 

Returns the next stored file that matches the file specification given in FindFirst().

Parameters:
find_data Pointer to the file info record where to store data.
Returns:
TRUE: A file is found FALSE: No file found.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::Flush (  RamHandle  hp  )  [static]
 

After this call completes, the view of the file in the RAM drive is completely consistent with the in memory view.

Returns:
if the operation is successful.

Formats the device with the given size and block size.

Parameters:
block_size New block size of the device.
Returns:
if formatting was successful

Returns:
The number of free bytes.

Get the error code during last file operation

Returns:

Returns the number of bytes in the RAM drive.

UINT32 RamHandler::GetUsedSpaceSize (   )  [static]
 

Returns the number of bytes used in the RAM drive.

Returns:
The number of used bytes.

void RamHandler::Initialize (   )  [static]
 

Initializes the root file, the current working directory and the capacity of the RAM drive. Must be called before any other method of this class.

Returns whether the parameter points to the working directory.

Parameters:

Returns:
whether the parameter handle is the current working directory

Returns whether a path name is a directory or not.

Parameters:

Returns:

BOOLEAN RamHandler::Read (  RamHandle  hp,
INT32  offset,
void HUGE *  buffer,
UINT32  count,
UINT32 &  bytes_read
)  [static]
 

Copies the data from the specified file to the buffer location in RAM. Only possible if the file exists and is opened for read-operations.

Parameters:
hp The file handle.
offset The offset within the file where to start copying from.
buffer Pointer to the local store where to copy data to.
count Number of bytes to copy.
bytes_read Number of bytes actually read.
Returns:
if the operation is successful.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::RemoveDir (  const WString &  dir_name  )  [static]
 

Deletes the directory including all the files in it.

Parameters:
dir_name The name of the directory to be deleted.
Returns:
if the operation is successful.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::Rename (  const WString &  old_file_name,
const WString &  new_file_name
)  [static]
 

An existing file with a specified name can be renamed to the new name. Not possible if the file is in the open state.

Parameters:
old_file_name Specifies the old name of the file.
new_file_name Specifies the new name for the file.
Returns:
if the operation is successful.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::Resize (  RamHandle  file_handle,
UINT32  new_size
)  [static]
 

An existing file can be resized to the new size. Not possible if the file is in the open state.

Parameters:
file_handle Specifies the handle to the file.
new_size Specifies the new size for the file.
Returns:
if the operation is successful.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::SetAttributes (  const WString &  filename,
UINT16  attr
)  [static]
 

Set the attributes of a file

Parameters:
filename The file name.
attr The attribute to set to the file.
Returns:
if the operation is possible.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::Truncate (  RamHandle  hp,
UINT32  new_size
)  [static]
 

Truncates the open file at hp to new_size. Any file blocks beyond new_size are freed and the file size is adjusted. The file pointer is left at the new end of the file.

Returns:
if the operation is successful.

BOOLEAN RamHandler::Write (  RamHandle  hp,
INT32  offset,
const void HUGE *  buffer,
UINT32  count
)  [static]
 

Copies the data from the specified location in RAM to the specified location in the file. Only possible if the file exists and is opened for write-operations.

Parameters:
hp The file handle.
offset The offset within the file where to start copying to.
buffer Pointer to the local store where to copy data from.
count Number of bytes to copy.
Returns:
if the operation is successful.
